Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package azcopy is earlier than 10.25.1-4, affected by CVE-2024-51744
